vi: gradually becoming smaller in size or amount, or fewer in number
selecting or combining ideas, styles, or tastes from a wide and diverse range of sources, rather than sticking to just one approach or tradition.
starting to develop faster, grow stronger, or become more successful over time.
confirm, support, or strengthen a statement, claim, or idea by providing additional evidence or proof.
keeping or maintaining something, rather than losing it. It's often used for people, information, or objects that are kept over time.
someone who is too satisfied with themselves or their situation, so much that they stop trying to improve or ignore potential problems.
unwilling or hesitant to do something — you don't really want to do it, often because you feel unsure, afraid, or disagree with it.
To change it so much that it becomes new or very different from before — like giving it a fresh identity, style, or purpose.
To show it off proudly or even boastfully, especially in a way meant to attract attention or admiration — sometimes even to make others jealous.
something that spreads out over a large area in an untidy, irregular, or uncontrolled way.

en: to be + as similar as an elephant's tusk is to its tail
to budge the needle on the scale
vi: to make a noticeable or meaningful change — to have a real impact or measurable effect on something.
(phrasal): giảm kích cỡ của cái gì hoặc số người của một nhóm
to feel sad, melancholy, or slightly depressed
To consider or judge something in a particular way (xem xét, đánh giá) thường dùng bị động

[attractive or exciting]

- thu hút, cuốn hút hoặc thú vị (về tính cách hoặc về 1 đồ vật thú vị)
A person who owns a business or property

(n) tính chính thức, tính liêm chính

- tính toàn bộ, toàn vẹn, nguyên vẹn
To sharpen or improve a skill or ability over time through practice
able to do many different things well, or adapt easily to different situation
be in a very difficult, serious or dangerous situation, especially one involving trouble, hardship
something is said to be true, but cannot proof yet
(n) sự xen vào, sự can thiệp

en: N + be + on the tip of everybody's tongue
vi: là chủ để của mn bàn tán
